languages.text: "Ваших прегрешений более чем достаточно, чтобы предстать перед трибуналом Инквизиции. И, уверяю, если вы не сделаете выводов из моих слов, так однажды и случится... Но пока я готов проявить милость, что мне не слишком свойственно".

"Your transgressions are sufficient grounds to bring you before the Inquisition's judgement. And believe me when I say that if you fail to draw certain conclusions from my words, this is what will eventually happen... But for now, I am willing to show leniency, which is rather uncharacteristic of me."
languages.original_text: "Ваших прегрешений более чем достаточно, чтобы предстать перед трибуналом Инквизиции. И, уверяю, если вы не сделаете выводов из моих слов, так однажды и случится... Но пока я готов проявить милость, что мне не слишком свойственно".

traits.locale_text: "Your transgressions are sufficient grounds to bring you before the Inquisition's judgement. And believe me when I say that if you don't draw certain conclusions from my words, that is what will eventually happen... But for now, I am willing to show leniency, which is rather uncharacteristic of me."

"Your transgressions are sufficient grounds to bring you before the Inquisition's judgement. And believe me when I say that if you don't draw certain conclusions from my words, that is what will eventually happen... But for now, I am willing to show leniency, which is rather uncharacteristic of me."

"Your transgressions are sufficient grounds to bring you before the Inquisition's judgement. And believe me when I say that if you fail to draw certain conclusions from my words, that is what will eventually happen... But for now, I am willing to show leniency, which is rather uncharacteristic of me."

"Your transgressions are sufficient grounds to bring you before the Inquisition's judgement. And believe me when I say that if you fail to draw certain conclusions from my words, that is what will eventually happen... But for now, I am willing to show leniency, which is rather uncharacteristic of me."

"Your transgressions are sufficient grounds to bring you before the Inquisition's judgement. And believe me when I say that if you fail to draw certain conclusions from my words, that is what will eventually happen... But for now, I am willing to show leniency, which is rather uncharacteristic of me."

languages.text: 「お前の罪に関して、異端審問庁の審判に連れていくに足る理由はそろっている。そして一定の結論を私の言葉から導け出せないときは私を信じるといい、最終的に何が起こるのかを…。だが、当面は慈悲を見せてやろう、実に私らしくはないのだが」
languages.original_text: "Your transgressions are sufficient grounds to bring you before the Inquisition's judgement. And believe me when I say that if you fail to draw certain conclusions from my words, this is what will eventually happen... But for now, I am willing to show leniency, which is rather uncharacteristic of me."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の罪に関して、異端審問庁の審判に連れていくに足る理由はそろっている。そして一定の結論を私の言葉から導け出せないときは私を信じるといい、最終的に何が起こるのかを…。だが、当面は慈悲を見せてやろう、実に私らしくはないのだが」

languages.original_text: "Your transgressions are sufficient grounds to bring you before the Inquisition's judgement. And believe me when I say that if you fail to draw certain conclusions from my words, that is what will eventually happen... But for now, I am willing to show leniency, which is rather uncharacteristic of me."

languages.text: “你犯下的罪行，已经足以把你送到审判庭接受审判了。相信我，如果我已经这么说了，可你仍然不能从中吸取教训，那我的预言恐怕终将实现……然而现在，我愿意对你网开一面，尽管这并不符合我一贯的行事风格。”
languages.original_text: "Your transgressions are sufficient grounds to bring you before the Inquisition's judgement. And believe me when I say that if you fail to draw certain conclusions from my words, this is what will eventually happen... But for now, I am willing to show leniency, which is rather uncharacteristic of me."

traits.locale_text: “你犯下的罪行，已经足以把你送到审判庭接受审判了。相信我，如果我已经这么说了，可你仍然不能从中吸取教训，那我的预言恐怕终将实现……然而现在，我愿意对你网开一面，尽管这并不符合我一贯的行事风格。”

languages.text: «Sus transgresiones son motivo suficiente para hacerle comparecer ante el juicio de la Inquisición, y créame cuando le digo que si no saca las conclusiones adecuadas de mis palabras acabará haciéndolo... pero, por ahora, estoy dispuesto a mostrar una indulgencia nada característica de mí».
languages.original_text: "Your transgressions are sufficient grounds to bring you before the Inquisition's judgement. And believe me when I say that if you fail to draw certain conclusions from my words, this is what will eventually happen... But for now, I am willing to show leniency, which is rather uncharacteristic of me."

traits.locale_text: «Sus transgresiones son motivo suficiente para hacerle comparecer ante el juicio de la Inquisición, y créame cuando le digo que si no saca las conclusiones adecuadas de mis palabras acabará haciéndolo... pero, por ahora, estoy dispuesto a mostrar una indulgencia nada característica de mí».

languages.text: « Vos transgressions à elles seules suffiraient à vous traîner devant la justice de l'Inquisition. Et si vous ne tirez aucune conclusion de mes paroles, c'est ce qui finira par arriver, croyez-moi... Mais je suis prêt à faire preuve d'indulgence pour le moment, ce qui n'est pas dans mes habitudes. »
languages.original_text: "Your transgressions are sufficient grounds to bring you before the Inquisition's judgement. And believe me when I say that if you fail to draw certain conclusions from my words, this is what will eventually happen... But for now, I am willing to show leniency, which is rather uncharacteristic of me."

traits.locale_text: « Vos transgressions à elles seules suffiraient à vous traîner devant la justice de l'Inquisition. Et si vous ne tirez aucune conclusion de mes paroles, c'est ce qui finira par arriver, croyez-moi... Mais je suis prêt à faire preuve d'indulgence pour le moment, ce qui n'est pas dans mes habitudes. »

languages.text: "Eure Verstöße reichen aus, um Euch vor das Gericht der Inquisition zu bringen. Und glaubt mir, wenn Ihr aus meinen Worten nicht ganz bestimmte Schlussfolgerungen zieht, wird es dazu auch kommen ... Aber für den Moment bin ich bereit zur Nachsicht, was ziemlich untypisch für mich ist."
languages.original_text: "Your transgressions are sufficient grounds to bring you before the Inquisition's judgement. And believe me when I say that if you fail to draw certain conclusions from my words, this is what will eventually happen... But for now, I am willing to show leniency, which is rather uncharacteristic of me."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Verstöße reichen aus, um Euch vor das Gericht der Inquisition zu bringen. Und glaubt mir, wenn Ihr aus meinen Worten nicht ganz bestimmte Schlussfolgerungen zieht, wird es dazu auch kommen ... Aber für den Moment bin ich bereit zur Nachsicht, was ziemlich untypisch für mich ist."

languages.text: "İşlediğin suçlar seni Engizisyon yargısının huzuruna çıkarmak için yeterli. Dediklerimden gerekli çıkarımları yapmayı başaramazsan inan bana olacak olan da er geç bu olacak. Lakin benden hiç beklenmeyecek bir hareket olsa da şimdilik müsamaha göstermekten yanayım."
languages.original_text: "Your transgressions are sufficient grounds to bring you before the Inquisition's judgement. And believe me when I say that if you fail to draw certain conclusions from my words, this is what will eventually happen... But for now, I am willing to show leniency, which is rather uncharacteristic of me."

traits.locale_text: "İşlediğin suçlar seni Engizisyon mahkemesine çıkarmak için yeterliler ve sözcüklerimden belli çıkarımlar yapmakta başarılı olamazsan inan bana gelecekte yaşanacak olan da tam olarak bu olacak ama şimdilik, her ne kadar benden beklenecek bir hareket olmasa da, sana müsamaha gösterme arzusundayım."
